_sText:
Info

Have you ever wondered wheres the chemical boxes in bombside B/A? Well I added green boxes like in 1.6 back at bombsides, And what about prop shadow? huh? You probably never heard it from valve.. Well I got that too.
You get some fancy lighting and shadows effects unlike the original map.

(Its client side map, Not for servers)

Its a hacked map so you must use a special tool to allow you to run such maps on any online server

Map in download
Dynamic soft shadow and lighting de_dust2.bsp
Dynamic sharp shadow and lighting de_dust2.bsp

NOTE: In new version of the map you will clip in some places in ground a bit because the ground is redone in the whole map.(can be fixed but tricky)
Note: Newer version and older version are available in download, Newer version introduces sharper shadows like in screenshots, Older with much softer shadows.
